snippet: Many investors see the month’s downturn as healthy, given the market’s torrid 30 percent rise last year.
abstract: Concerns about global economy and company earnings in United States, as well as turmoil in emerging markets, leads major indexes to their worst month in two years; many investors see downturn in January 2014 as healthy, given market’s torrid 30 percent rise in 2013.
lead_paragraph: Many investors see the month’s downturn as healthy, given the market’s torrid 30 percent rise last year.

headline.main: January Ends With Another Decline on Wall Street
headline.print_headline: January Ends With Another Decline on Wall Street
